comments: You are definitely going to have to work in his class. He gives you the grade you earn and he makes you learn the material. If you just want to just get though Chem, take someone else. If you really want to learn and know it, take Buboltz. He\'s helpful. Go see him during office hours. Hard class but good pay off.
He is really great professor! If you can take gen chem 2 with him I highly recommend it! He is also a nice guy to talk to outside of class and asks about your interests. An overall good professor!

Great teacher. Difficult and can be intimidating. But if you want to succeed he will do everything he can to help you. Attend class and labs. Definitely see him if you are struggling even though he can be super intimidating.

Not only is he an amazing teacher, but an amazing individual as well. This was the first class I\'ve had to work at, but it was completely worth it. Def go to his office hours, not only for help, but just to talk and learn about more than just the material in class. TAKE WHENEVER POSSIBLE!!!
Possibly the best teacher I have had.. very helpful and he cares about how the students do.. take him if you can!

Absolutely fantastic! He is very energetic and loves what he is teaching. He is very helpful when you have a problem. Test are hard, but you can do well on them if you take the time to go over the materials.

He really really cares, but use his office time to your advantage, he expects a lot but is super interesting to listen to. His tests are super hard and expects you to know the whole chapter. Really trys to help you out.
Awesome teacher! Expects a lot from you but gives a lot of himself in return. Has a real passion for the subject. Would definitely take one of his classes again.
Fantastic teacher! Probably the best I ever had. The class wasn\'t too hard and the actual lectures were fun to go to.
goes through chapters a little fast but he is concerned about your grade. he wants to help you
great teacher.. keeps me entertained. fun to learn from..his tests are very difficult.
Good Teacher, really cares how you do in his class. Very helpful when you go in for office hours. Seems hard to approach but really isn\'t. He is really funny!
He is a great prof, very helpful and actually wants his students to do well in the class. does lots and lots of example problems and wants to get out of lab just as fast as you do
Definately makes sure that all students understand the material! Great professor!
